title: Bitcoin, Ethereum fall sharply as crypto sell-off resumes
description: Bitcoin and Ethereum saw heavy selling at the start of a new month, resuming the recent turbulence in digital assets.

title: Bitcoin Slides More Than 5% As Crypto Selloff Resumes
description: Bitcoin briefly dropped below $86,000 early on Monday, reversing the recovery it mounted last week following its worst month since the 2021 crypto crash.
